channel.title: How can i create my own custom item or change the color of an item
channel.description: ok so my friend made me owner of his client told me that he creates his own items and he told me he changes the color of them.. he told me in order for me to do it i need to find out how to do it by my self.. i cant find a tut to help me out ... if u guys know a referal link or something of a tut please let me know i wanna do it so bad!! lol thanks[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 21, 2008, 05:28:33 pm[/size][hr]bump!
